------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The life of Rockn roll legend Richie Valens bursts on screen in this celebrated movie, songs and the striking performances from Lou Diamond Phillips as Richie and Esai Morales as his half-brother, Bob. LA BAMBA depicts the meteoric rise of the boy of 17 years, of Mexican descent, from his work in the field to be a rock star in America, showing its great successes and his date with destiny. Powered by hits by Richie Valens, the interpretations by the Grammy-winning band Los Lobos, as well as classics from the '50s, LA BAMBA recreates the thrilling early days of rock and pays homage to the legacy of a remarkable talent whose music crossed all borders .
